belongs_to_collection.name: The Dog Who Saved Christmas Collection

overview: Zeus, a Labrador Retriever and a former police dog (voiced by Mario LÃ³pez), has lost his bark after his barking ended up blowing off a five-year investigation and his partner can't shoot straight again and ends up at the pound. He is adopted by a father (played by Gary Valentine) as both an early Christmas present and as a good guard dog for the house, but the mom (played by Elisa Donovan) is hesitant.
title: The Dog Who Saved Christmas
